page.title: 07Colonel Tingey-Leisure.
page.content: Before Colonel Tingey retired,he was a {teacher}at Millfield Junior School, Edgarley Hall.He taught geography and history,and also enjoyed his work. He is a very strong conservative and his views are very much in favour of private{education.}Both of his daughters were privately educated and he quoted:"If you want a bit more then you've got to pay for it" In his spare time he{participates}in Sealed Knot activities.This is basic- ally the re-enactment of battles which took place during the Civil War.Last week the Sealed Knot re-enacted the Battle of Sedgemoor. The most noticable{changes}he has seen in Greinton are the disappearance of farm labourers in Greinton's 23 houses.
